On April 21 at WMiI, we invite you to the block of events "Open Mind - Science to the Square" during the 22nd Toruń Festival of Science and Arts! Here are the events at our Faculty:

* Science Picnic: from 9:30 a.m. to 2:30 p.m. whole families can immerse themselves in the world of mathematical fun, games and puzzles.
* Exhibition of computer projects: from 9:30 am to 2:30 pm come and enter the world of electronics, computers and software. See the projects created at WMiI!
* Games with prizes: escape room (for sign-ups), dice championship (for sign-ups) and a field game around the Faculty building (from 9:30 am to 2:30 pm).
* Lectures:
	* 10:00-11:15 What don't mathematicians know?
	* 11:30-12:45, What do Titanic survivors, Tiffany diamonds and 1970s American cars have in common? About open datasets.
	* 13:00 - 14:15, Open source: transforming the digital future.

You can find the full festival program at www.festiwal.torun.pl (link: http://www.festiwal.torun.pl), and learn about our events by clicking on the link https://tiny.pl/dr5z3

metadata.news_title: Toruń Festival of Science and Arts, 21.04.2024

page_content:
* Full-time studies (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/wmii/studia-stacjonarne-i-i-ii-stopnia)
* Part-time studies (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/wmii/studia/studia-niestacjonarne)
* Study candidate zone (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/wmii/rekrutacja)

The 19th "Information Technology in Education" Conference, IwE2023, will be held at WMiI from *22-24 September 2023*. The theme of this year's conference is: *Intelligence education - challenges of the modern world*.

The conference is addressed to school and university teachers, researchers, methodologists, educational institutions, ministries, method centers, educational companies and all those interested in the development of IT education in our country and the world. Detailed information about the conference, rules for submitting speeches, workshops and publications can be found at https://iwe.mat.umk.pl. You are cordially invited!

metadata.news_title: XIX Conference "Information Technology in Education", IwE2023

page_content:
*** Online Polish-Ukrainian dictionary of school mathematical concepts / польсько-український інтернет-словних шкільних математичних термінів. ***

Ця ініціатива є реакцією на проблеми під час використаня популярних інтернет-додатків для перекладу, оскільки вони часто роблять помилки у перекладі математичної термінології. Перша версія словника доступна за адресою: https://ua.mat.umk.pl/
The initiative is a response to the difficulties accompanying the use of popular online translation applications, as they often make mistakes when dealing with specialized terms. The first version of the dictionary is available at: https://ua.mat.umk.pl/

*** Recruitment/набір ***

Ви можете вивчати математику або інформатику на факультеті математики та інформатики Університету Миколи Коперника в Торуні! Набір триває. Студенти, які переїжджають з українських вищих навчальних закладів, можуть зареєструватися навчання до Університету Миколая Коперника в Торуні. Пропозиція стосується лише студентів українських вищих навчальних закладів, які були змушені покинути свою країну внаслідок початку війни. Навчання на факультеті математики та інформатики ведеться польською мовою. Зареєструватися можна тут: https://irk.umk.pl/pl/offer/PUA2021/

You can study mathematics or computer science at the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science of Nicolaus Copernicus University in Torun! Recruitment is ongoing. Those transferring from Ukrainian universities can register to study at the Nicolaus Copernicus University in Torun. The offer is addressed exclusively to Ukrainian university students who were forced to leave their country due to the outbreak of war. Studies at the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science are conducted in Polish. You can register here: https://irk.umk.pl/pl/offer/PUA2021/
